title: Chatbots to strengthen democracy: An interdisciplinary seminar to train identifying argumentation techniques of science denial
summary: In recent times, discussions on social media platforms have increasingly come under scrutiny due to the proliferation of science denial and fake news. Traditional solutions, such as regulatory actions, have been implemented to mitigate the spread of misinformation; however, these measures alone are not sufficient.
